name: Skull Bat Boy (demo)
description:
Skull Bat Boy's graveyard has erupted in chaos! 
Help him restore peace!

Controls!
Triple jump = "A" button three times
bone throw = "Spacebar"
move left = "Left" arrow
move right = "Right" arrow

Music!
"Grim Quiet" / Thomas Frost
